pages.text: $(li)Used to craft the $(l:amazons/devices/armor)Amazons armor$(/l)$(li)Used on the $(l:misc/blocks/amazon_cell_mutator)Amazon Cell Mutator$(/l) to obtain the $(l:amazons/items/omega_amazon_cell_vial)Omega$(/l), $(l:amazons/items/alpha_amazon_cell_vial)Alpha$(/l), $(l:amazons/items/sigma_amazon_cell_vial)Sigma$(/l), or $(l:amazons/items/neo_amazon_cell_vial)Neo$(/l) cell variants
Obtained by using $(l:misc/items/empty_vial)Empty Vials$(/l) on the $(l:misc/blocks/amazon_cell_extractor)Amazon Cell Extractor$(/l)
